headline: Russian Banks to Switch to Chinese Card System after Visa, Mastercard Suspend Operations in Russia
author: Brittany Bernstein
sentences: The announcement comes one day after Mastercard announced cards issued by Russian banks will no longer be supported by its network, while any Mastercard issued outside the country will not work at Russian stores or ATMs.
Multiple Russian banks on Sunday announced plans to begin issuing cards using a Chinese card operator’s system with Russia’s Mir network after Visa and MasterCard pulled out of Russia.
Sberbank, Alfa Bank and Tinkoff all said they would begin using the Chinese UnionPay system, according to Reuters.
Visa similarly announced it is working to suspend all transactions
